channel.title: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]
channel.description: I want to add a boss which can be killed only ONCE by each members.. How can I do it?

item.title: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Npchandler.java

Create a boolean or an int like bosskilled = 1 or bosskilled = true and check if its true then you can’t kill it again, and if it’s false then they can kill it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]

item.title: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

or even easier, make a tele command to get to the boss and make a token like he said and do this

if(command.equals("") && bosskilled = 0) {
c.getPA().tele(x, y, z);
}else{
sendmsg(“Sorry, You have already killed this monster…”);
}

but make sure that once the boss is killed it teles them away so they cant kill it a 2nd time before teleing away

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]

item.title: How to make a boss killable only once? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Create a new token and when ever you kill the boss it becomes equal to 1 then in the kill monster code made it only be able to be attacked if it is equal to 0

Read full topic
